awd_titl_txt: Complex Shape Fabrication Using the Robotic Filament WindingTechnique
awd_abstract_narration: This project will determine the feasibility of using a robotic system           to wind filaments in complex shapes with advanced composite materials.          Objectives are:  (1) create a robot filament winding workcell,                  incorporating an intelligent winding mechaniam and associated                   controller; (2) develop software to wind generic shapes using                   algorithms that map three dimensional curve functions into two                  dimensions and robotic indexing motions; and (3) establish the                  capability of robotic winding in a practical application.  Future               research will build on this program and create a generic winding system         for 3-dimensional complex shapes at a cost significantly less than              current winding systems.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships
